data.name: satyrographos
data.synopsis: A package manager for SATySFi
data.description:
Satyrographos is a package manager for [SATySFi].

Satyrographos is distributed under the LGPL-3.0 license.


  [SATySFi]: https://github.com/gfngfn/SATySFi
  [Satyrographos]: https://github.com/na4zagin3/satyrographos

data.name: satyrographos-snapshot-stable
data.synopsis: Snapshot of stable libraries in Satyrographos Repo

data.name: satysfi
data.synopsis: A statically-typed, functional typesetting system
data.description: SATySFi is a typesetting system with a static type system. It consists mainly of two “layers” ― the text layer and the program layer. The former is for writing documents in LaTeX-like syntax. The latter, which has ML-like syntax, is for defining functions and commands. SATySFi enables you to write documents markuped with flexible commands of your own making. In addition, its informative type error reporting will be a good help to your writing.

data.name: satysfi-assert-eq
data.synopsis: Provides function as the Rust's assert_eq! macro
data.description: Provides function as the Rust's assert_eq! macro

data.name: satysfi-base
data.synopsis: A collection of utility functions and modules for SATySFi
data.description:
This is a collection of utility functions and modules for SATySFi. Because the library bundled with the default installation configuration of SATySFi is currently not rich enough, this project aims to provide a complementary library sufficient for most situations in typesetting.

this requires Satyrographos to install. See https://github.com/na4zagin3/satyrographos.

data.name: satysfi-bibyfi
data.synopsis: A bibliography framework for SATySFi
data.description:
This project has been under developing. The API may be broken dramatically and suddenly

A bibliography framework for SATySFi

This project is inspired by cs-thesis and borrowing many codes from it.

data.name: satysfi-lib
data.synopsis: DEPRECATED: A collection of utility functions and modules for SATySFi
data.description:
DEPRECATED: This package has been renamed with satysfi-base.

This is a collection of utility functions and modules for SATySFi. Because the library bundled with the default installation configuration of SATySFi is currently not rich enough, this project aims to provide a complementary library sufficient for most situations in typesetting.

this requires Satyrographos to install. See https://github.com/na4zagin3/satyrographos.
